Class LevelOne

  • java.lang.Object
    • sample.LevelOne

  • public class LevelOne
extends java.lang.Object
    The LevelOne class for Dress for Success. Outputs a multiple choice quiz on which clothing is worn for specific weather.
    Version:
    3
    Author:
    Seyone Chithrananda
